name: Animal Survival: Wild Bear Simulator 3D
description:
Become a large bear - the mighty beast of northern woods! Enjoy the wilderness - hunt other animals, mate with females and gather a large pack of bears! Rule over the plains and forests as a real lord - fight with other bears or befriend them, mate with females and raise cubs to made them part of your pack! Rush across the woods and plains and feel yourself a strong and powerful animal with Animal Survival: Wild Bear Simulator 3D in 3D!

Roam free across this unfriendly wilderness, full of different animals – some of them can be your meal, but others are your direct rivals! Fight for your life and territory with other predators, earn experience and level up your skills. Collect coins and buy power-ups – it could help you to survive!

Mind your hunger and a health indicator – if one of them drops, your chances to survive the winter would fell too. Eat plenty of food, collect fat and be ready for slumber. Remember – spring comes after winter each year. When your bear would wake up from his long sleep, it’d be hungry and angry as a real wild beast!

Hunt rabbits and deer, catch fish and find beehives with tasty honey – but beware, you could be someone’s victim too! Human hunters come into the woods each winter to kill a lot of animals with their guns – and they’ll get a bear as the trophy with a great pleasure! Avoid them or fight them, kill or be killed, live a life of a large bear with Animal Survival: Wild Bear Simulator 3D!

Animal Survival: Wild Bear Simulator 3D features:

Hunt, mate and raise cubs as a real bear
Be ready for changing seasons – sleep at winter and roam free another year!
Intuitive and simple controls
Amazing 3D graphics

Winter is coming! Are you ready for it? Well, it’s time to prepare yourself and to prepare your bear! Hunt, fish, run over plains and forests, battle other predators and gather bears and some other animals in your pack! Start your own wild adventure with Animal Survival: Wild Bear Simulator 3D!
